display_help: The Pain Field is an extreme countermeasure for situations where non-lethal measures are not enough. Pulsing waves of energy cause damage over time to enemies within radius of the generator, making the pain field an ideal area denial and supplemental defense system.
display_target_help: Your health is being drained away.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
